text: قُلۡ هَٰذِهِۦ سَبِيلِيٓ أَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ عَلَىٰ بَصِيرَةٍ أَنَا۠ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَنِيۖ وَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

translation.en: Say, "This is my way; I invite to Allah with insight, I and those who follow me. And exalted is Allah; and I am not of those who associate others with Him
translation.id: Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Inilah jalanku, aku dan orang-orang yang mengikutiku mengajak (kamu) kepada Allah dengan yakin, Mahasuci Allah, dan aku tidak termasuk orang-orang musyrik
